_comment: Blog Configuration - Update these settings to customize your Jupyter Book blog

blog.title: Jupyter Book Blog Template
blog.description: A modern technical blog powered by Jupyter Book
blog.author: Blog Author
blog.copyright: Â© 2024 Blog Author. All rights reserved.

logo._comment: Logo can be 'text' or 'image'. If image, provide path or URL

social._comment: Social links - leave empty string if not used

navigation._comment: Configure navigation structure - Quick Links section

homepage.welcome_text: Welcome to my technical blog! This is where I share my thoughts, experiences, and insights on various topics.
homepage.footer_note: *Add your own posts to the `posts/` directory and run `python scripts/generate_posts.py` to update this page automatically.*

deployment._comment: Deployment settings - IMPORTANT: Set enabled to true after customizing your blog

github_actions._comment: Set to true to enable GitHub Actions deployment AFTER you've customized the blog settings above

bibliography._mode_comment: Bibliography modes: 'global' (single file), 'per-post' (matching .bib per post), 'all-files' (all .bib in references/), 'auto' (smart detection with fallbacks)
bibliography._global_file_comment: Default bibliography file used in 'global' mode or as fallback
bibliography._override_comment: Allow posts to specify their own .bib files and styles in frontmatter (bibliography: filename.bib, citation_style: style_name)
